      • Upgrade

    • Method Detail

      • installImage

        public ClusterInfo installImage(java.lang.String version,
                       boolean force)
        Installs an image. Image can be installed only if the number of installed images are less than MAX_SOFTWARE_VERSIONS.

        API Call: POST /upgrade/image/install

        Parameters:
        version - The version to be installed
        force - If true, image will be installed even if the maximum number of versions installed are more than MAX_SOFTWARE_VERSIONS
        Returns:
        The cluster information of the installed image

      • cancelInstallImage

        public ClusterInfo cancelInstallImage()
        Cancels download of an image

        API Call: POST /upgrade/install/cancel

        Returns:
        The new state of the cluster

      • getDownloadProgress

        public DownloadProgress getDownloadProgress()
        Provides progress information when an image download is in progress

        API Call: POST /upgrade/image/download/progress

        Returns:
        The Download Progress information

      • removeImage

        public ClusterInfo removeImage(java.lang.String version,
                      boolean force)
        Remove an image. Image can be removed only if the number of installed images are greater than MAX_SOFTWARE_VERSIONS.

        API Call: POST /upgrade/image/remove

        Parameters:
        version - Version to be removed
        force - If true, image will be removed even if the maximum number of versions installed are less than MAX_SOFTWARE_VERSIONS
        Returns:
        The cluster information

      • removeImage

        public ClusterInfo removeImage(java.lang.String version)
        Remove an image. Image can be removed only if the number of installed images are greater than MAX_SOFTWARE_VERSIONS.
        Parameters:
        version - Version to be removed
        Returns:
        The cluster information

      • getTargetVersion

        public TargetVersionResponse getTargetVersion()
        Show the current target version.

        API Call: GET /upgrade/target-version

        Returns:
        The target version

      • setTargetVersion

        public ClusterInfo setTargetVersion(java.lang.String version,
                           boolean verifyVersionNumbers)
        Update target version. Version can only be updated incrementally. Ex: storageos-1.0.0.2.xx can only be updated to sotrageos-1.0.0.3.xx and not to storageos-1.0.0.4.xx

        API Call: PUT /upgrade/target-version

        Parameters:
        version - The new version number
        verifyVersionNumbers - If true, version numbers are verified.
        Returns:
        The cluster information

      • setTargetVersion

        public ClusterInfo setTargetVersion(java.lang.String version)
        Update target version with no version number verification. Version can only be updated incrementally. Ex: storageos-1.0.0.2.xx can only be updated to sotrageos-1.0.0.3.xx and not to storageos-1.0.0.4.xx
        Parameters:
        version - The new version number
        Returns:
        The cluster information

      • getClusterInfo

        public ClusterInfo getClusterInfo(boolean showAllVersions)
        Shows the cluster information with all removable versions.

        API Call: GET /upgrade/cluster-state

        Parameters:
        showAllVersions - If true, will show all removable versions even though the installed versions are less than MAX_SOFTWARE_VERSIONS
        Returns:
        The cluster information

      • getClusterInfo

        public ClusterInfo getClusterInfo()
        Shows the cluster information, excluding all removable versions.
        Returns:
        The cluster state information

      • getClusterState

        public java.lang.String getClusterState()
        Convenience method that gets the cluster state from the cluster info.
        Returns:
        the cluster state
